includedAssets.title: Day 4: 7:00 A.M. To 8:00 A.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep1 - Day 4: 7:00 A.M. To 8:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Day four of the seat-edge drama. A train explodes and a known terrorist is spotted in LA. It's going to be Jack Bauer's most dangerous day yet.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Day four of the seat-edge drama. A train explodes and a known terrorist is spotted in LA. It's going to be Jack Bauer's most dangerous day yet.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Day four of the seat-edge drama. A train explodes and a known terrorist is spotted in LA. It's going to be Jack Bauer's most dangerous day yet.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 8:00 A.M. To 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep2 - Day 4: 8:00 A.M. To 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As terrorists broadcast footage of kidnapped Defence Secretary James Heller, Jack is desperate to rejoin CTU and do what he does best.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As terrorists broadcast footage of kidnapped Defence Secretary James Heller, Jack is desperate to rejoin CTU and do what he does best.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As terrorists broadcast footage of kidnapped Defence Secretary James Heller, Jack is desperate to rejoin CTU and do what he does best.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 9:00 A.M To 10.00 A.M
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep3 - Day 4: 9:00 A.M To 10.00 A.M
includedAssets.synopsis: With Chloe's help, Jack trails the terrorists, and must resort to desperate measures when it looks like they are getting away.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: With Chloe's help, Jack trails the terrorists, and must resort to desperate measures when it looks like they are getting away.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: With Chloe's help, Jack trails the terrorists, and must resort to desperate measures when it looks like they are getting away.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 10:00 A.M. To 11:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack falls deeper into trouble as he stalls for time, and Heller fakes a heart attack in a desperate escape bid. Dina gives her son sinister orders.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack falls deeper into trouble as he stalls for time, and Heller fakes a heart attack in a desperate escape bid. Dina gives her son sinister orders.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack falls deeper into trouble as he stalls for time, and Heller fakes a heart attack in a desperate escape bid. Dina gives her son sinister orders.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 11:00 A.M. To 12:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: As Audrey and Heller make a suicide pact, Kalil sees he's being tracked and makes the ultimate sacrifice. The President gives an order that could prove fatal for Jack...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Audrey and Heller make a suicide pact, Kalil sees he's being tracked and makes the ultimate sacrifice.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Audrey and Heller make a suicide pact, Kalil sees he's being tracked and makes the ultimate sacrifice. The President gives an order that could prove fatal for Jack...

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 12:00 P.M. To 1:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack storms the warehouse where Heller and Audrey are being held. Plus, the contents of the briefcase are revealed and there's a mole at CTU.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack storms the warehouse where Heller and Audrey are being held. Plus, the contents of the briefcase are revealed and there's a mole at CTU.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack storms the warehouse where Heller and Audrey are being held. Plus, the contents of the briefcase are revealed and there's a mole at CTU.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 1:00 P.M. To 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep7 - Day 4: 1:00 P.M. To 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Just when Audrey thinks she's safe, the terrorists strike back. And will Dina go as far as sacrificing her son's life to the cause?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Just when Audrey thinks she's safe, the terrorists strike back. And will Dina go as far as sacrificing her son's life to the cause?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Just when Audrey thinks she's safe, the terrorists strike back. And will Dina go as far as sacrificing her son's life to the cause?

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 2:00 P.M. To 3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep8 - Day 4: 2:00 P.M. To 3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack enlists the only person he can trust: Tony Almeida. Both are disgraced ex-CTU employees, but they could be the only people capable of stopping nuclear meltdown.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack enlists the only person he can trust: Tony Almeida.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack enlists the only person he can trust: Tony Almeida. Both are disgraced ex-CTU employees, but they could be the only people capable of stopping nuclear meltdown.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 3:00 P.M. To 4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep9 - Day 4: 3:00 P.M. To 4:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While one nuclear reactor goes into meltdown, Jack closes in on Dina and Behrooz. But ruthless Navi gets there first. Pulsating drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While one nuclear reactor goes into meltdown, Jack closes in on Dina and Behrooz. But ruthless Navi gets there first. Pulsating drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While one nuclear reactor goes into meltdown, Jack closes in on Dina and Behrooz. But ruthless Navi gets there first. Pulsating drama.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 4:00 P.M. To 5:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: CTU makes some crucial advances; Tony is reinstated; and Audrey learns some shattering news about her husband. Could he be connected to the terrorists?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: CTU makes some crucial advances; Tony is reinstated; and Audrey learns some shattering news about her husband.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: CTU makes some crucial advances; Tony is reinstated; and Audrey learns some shattering news about her husband. Could he be connected to the terrorists?

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 5:00 P.M. To 6:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The clock ticks towards meltdown for the remaining nuclear plants, but Driscoll must deal with her schizophrenic daughter's crisis instead. Nerve-jangling action.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The clock ticks towards meltdown for the remaining nuclear plants, but Driscoll must deal with her schizophrenic daughter's crisis instead.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The clock ticks towards meltdown for the remaining nuclear plants, but Driscoll must deal with her schizophrenic daughter's crisis instead. Nerve-jangling action.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 6:00 P.M. To 7:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While Jack searches for intel on Marwan, an electronic pulse bomb, set to destroy all electronic systems within a mile, is triggered. And there's a shock for Tony.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Jack searches for intel on Marwan, an electronic pulse bomb, set to destroy all electronic systems within a mile, is triggered.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Jack searches for intel on Marwan, an electronic pulse bomb, set to destroy all electronic systems within a mile, is triggered. And there's a shock for Tony.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 7:00 P.M. To 8:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While Tony and Michelle struggle to work together again, terrorist mastermind Marwan starts to execute the next phase of his plans. Explosive drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Tony and Michelle struggle to work together again, terrorist mastermind Marwan starts to execute the next phase of his plans. Explosive drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Tony and Michelle struggle to work together again, terrorist mastermind Marwan starts to execute the next phase of his plans. Explosive drama.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 8:00 P.M. To 9:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack and Dina go undercover to convince another terrorist to help them, Audrey realises how much she still cares for Paul... and Chloe's back.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack and Dina go undercover to convince another terrorist to help them, Audrey realises how much she still cares for Paul... and Chloe's back.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack and Dina go undercover to convince another terrorist to help them, Audrey realises how much she still cares for Paul... and Chloe's back.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 9:00 P.M. To 10:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While CTU makes a highly risky move to exchange Behrooz for Jack, Marwan's accomplice Anderson hijacks a stealth fighter and prepares for take-off.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While CTU makes a highly risky move to exchange Behrooz for Jack, Marwan's accomplice Anderson hijacks a stealth fighter and prepares for take-off.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While CTU makes a highly risky move to exchange Behrooz for Jack, Marwan's accomplice Anderson hijacks a stealth fighter and prepares for take-off.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 10:00 P.M. To 11:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While CTU is distracted, pursuing evil mastermind Marwan, his accomplice Anderson is on a suicide mission in a stealth fighter, heading for Air Force One.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While CTU is pursuing evil mastermind Marwan, his accomplice Anderson is on a suicide mission in a stealth fighter, heading for Air Force One.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While CTU is distracted, pursuing evil mastermind Marwan, his accomplice Anderson is on a suicide mission in a stealth fighter, heading for Air Force One.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 11:00 P.M. To 12.00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Amidst the wreckage of Air Force One, nuclear warhead locations and their activation codes fall into the hands of the terrorists. And America needs a new President.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Amidst the wreckage of Air Force One, nuclear warhead locations and their activation codes fall into the hands of the terrorists.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Amidst the wreckage of Air Force One, nuclear warhead locations and their activation codes fall into the hands of the terrorists. And America needs a new President.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 12:00 A.M. To 1:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: While Marwan's men hijack a nuclear warhead in Iowa, CTU captures a man linked to the terrorists. But the interrogation grinds to a halt. The clock's ticking...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Marwan's men hijack a nuclear warhead in Iowa, CTU captures a man linked to the terrorists. But the interrogation grinds to a halt.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Marwan's men hijack a nuclear warhead in Iowa, CTU captures a man linked to the terrorists. But the interrogation grinds to a halt. The clock's ticking...

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 1:00 A.M. To 2:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: When President Logan bungles the plan to capture Marwan, he looks to a familiar face for help. Plus, Chloe's in the firing line.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When President Logan bungles the plan to capture Marwan, he looks to a familiar face for help. Plus, Chloe's in the firing line.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When President Logan bungles the plan to capture Marwan, he looks to a familiar face for help. Plus, Chloe's in the firing line.

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 2:00 A.M To 3:00 A.M.
includedAssets.altTitle: S4, Ep20 - Day 4: 2:00 A.M To 3:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack is on another renegade mission, kidnapping a Chinese national. But he's confronted with a dilemma: one surgeon, two patients. Whose life is more important?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack is on another renegade mission, kidnapping a Chinese national, but he's confronted with a dilemma.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Jack is on another renegade mission, kidnapping a Chinese national. But he's confronted with a dilemma: one surgeon, two patients. Whose life is more important?

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 3:00 A.M. To 4:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: For the first time, Jack comes eyeball to eyeball with arch enemy Marwan. But is he in time to stop the stolen warhead being fired?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: For the first time, Jack comes eyeball to eyeball with arch enemy Marwan. But is he in time to stop the stolen warhead being fired?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: For the first time, Jack comes eyeball to eyeball with arch enemy Marwan. But is he in time to stop the stolen warhead being fired?

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 4:00 A.M. To 5:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: It's not looking good for CTU. They can't track where the warhead is going, Marwan is proving impossible to deal with and Tony is in serious trouble...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: It's not looking good for CTU. They can't track where the warhead is going, Marwan is proving impossible to deal with and Tony is in serious trouble..
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's not looking good for CTU. They can't track where the warhead is going, Marwan is proving impossible to deal with and Tony is in serious trouble...

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 5:00 A.M. To 6:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Time's ticking away, and CTU still haven't located the stolen warhead. In this 23rd hour, has Tony lost his life to the cause?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Time's ticking away, and CTU still haven't located the stolen warhead. In this 23rd hour, has Tony lost his life to the cause?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Time's ticking away, and CTU still haven't located the stolen warhead. In this 23rd hour, has Tony lost his life to the cause?

includedAssets.title: Day 4: 6:00 A.M. To 7.00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Time's up. Has CTU averted another global disaster? And will Jack pay the price for some extraordinary risk-taking? A heart-stopping finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Time's up. Has CTU averted another global disaster? And will Jack pay the price for some extraordinary risk-taking? A heart-stopping finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Time's up. Has CTU averted another global disaster? And will Jack pay the price for some extraordinary risk-taking? A heart-stopping finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Now working for the Secretary of Defence, Jack must foil a terror plot to attack Los Angeles. Kiefer Sutherland returns as the relentless Jack Bauer in this action-packed, pulsating fourth season.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the action packed fourth season, Jack works to foil a terrorist plot to attack Los Angeles. Kiefer Sutherland returns as the relentless Jack Bauer.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Now working for the Secretary of Defence, Jack must foil a terror plot to attack Los Angeles. Kiefer Sutherland returns as the relentless Jack Bauer in this action-packed, pulsating fourth season.

includedIn.synopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
